name: Surface Bound (Becca Miller, Bryget Anderson)
description:
Find your way free from an underground labyrinth with the help of other wanderers. Made for Rainbow Jam 2021.

Controls
WASD / Arrow keys to move
C to interact

Credits
Design by Becca Miller and Bryget Anderson
Art by Bryget Anderson
Programming and Writing by Becca Miller

Audio adapted from the following sources under the Creative Commons Attribution License:
Ambience "Aftermath" by Yuval
Spring Birds Loop by Steaq
